About Marc Slater

Marc is the Principal Instructor at Mad4fitness. He has been training in various forms of Martial Arts such as Karate, Freestyle Kickboxing, Muay Thai, Boxing and Jujitsu from the age of 15. He holds a 3rd Dan Black belt in Wado Ryu Karate and has also competed in national full contact kickboxing and boxing events, including some for local charities.

He began teaching in 2002 and built up a successful Martial Arts School in the UK, teaching both kids and adults from the ages of 5 to 62. Due to his partners work commitments, he moved to Australia in May 2013, when he brought his unique teaching programme to Sydney.

Based primarily on the Lower North Shore, but with classes elsewhere, Marc is available for one on one or group personal fitness training where he uses techniques from a range of Martial Arts alongside more traditional fitness work. He also teaches kids and adult karate and boxing classes at a number of locations across Sydney.

Marc is a certified Martial Arts Instructor and has Public Liability and Indemnity cover with Worldwide Sports Insurance, he also has a Working with Children certificate; Ref WWC0010126E.
